meanings.sent1: She completed the puzzle unaidedly, showing her independence.
meanings.sent2: He walked unaidedly to the store, proud of his self-reliance.
meanings.sent3: The little girl unaidedly tied her shoes, impressing her parents.
meanings.sent4: The bird flew unaidedly across the sky, free and unrestricted.
meanings.sent5: The athlete unaidedly crossed the finish line, achieving victory on his own.

meanings.sent1: The unaidedly built house stood strong against the storm.
meanings.sent2: She faced the challenge unaidedly, proving her resilience.
meanings.sent3: The unaidedly plant grew tall and healthy in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The unaidedly decision led to unexpected success.
meanings.sent5: The unaidedly student aced the exam, relying solely on their own knowledge.
